DataElement.preferredName: OHIP Questionnaire Problem with Teeth Denture or Mouth Have Been Self-Conscious Frequency Score Five Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of an individual's response to a OHIP question about how often they have been self-conscious because of problems with their teeth, denture or mouth.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: OHIP Questionnaire Problem with Teeth Denture or Mouth Have Been Self-Conscious Frequency Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Measures a person's perceptions of the social impact of oral disorders on their well-being; measures self-reported dysfunction, discomfort and disability attributed to oral conditions._A survey question about whether a person has problems with their teeth, denture or mouth._A survey question about whether a person has been self-conscious._The number of occurrences of something within a given time period._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Measures a person's perceptions of the social impact of oral disorders on their well-being; measures self-reported dysfunction, discomfort and disability attributed to oral conditions.

Concepts.definition: Measures a person's perceptions of the social impact of oral disorders on their well-being; measures self-reported dysfunction, discomfort and disability attributed to oral conditions.

Property.preferredName: Problem with Teeth Denture or Mouth Have Been Self-Conscious Frequency Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A survey question about whether a person has problems with their teeth, denture or mouth.:A survey question about whether a person has been self-conscious.:The number of occurrences of something within a given time period. (NCI):A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.longName: Problem with Teeth, Denture or Mouth
Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual has or had problems with their teeth, denture or mouth.

Concepts.longName: Self-Conscious due to Problems with Teeth, Dentures or Mouth
Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual is or has been self-conscious of problems with their teeth, dentures or mouth.
The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for CCR using best practices for curation of measures. mc 2/22/12

ValueDomain.preferredName: Problem with Teeth Denture or Mouth Frequency Score Five Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A survey question about whether a person has problems with their teeth, denture or mouth._The number of occurrences of something within a given time period._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability._A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one._The precise location of something; a spatially limited location._an ordered reference standard.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: On most occasions, or in most situations.

Concepts.definition: On most occasions, or in most situations.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: On many occasions, or in many situations.

Concepts.definition: On many occasions, or in many situations.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

Concepts.definition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

Concepts.definition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

Concepts.longName: Problem with Teeth, Denture or Mouth
Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual has or had problems with their teeth, denture or mouth.
The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.
The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.
An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
